entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 07:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: WSW 53 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
